alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 3:28PM CDT until July 03 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 328 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Geronimo, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawton, Walters, Geronimo, southern Fort Sill, and Hulen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
